title: Dynamic que ruined league
body: nuff said. Riot you guys really suck.

replies.body:
What a constructive, useful thread.

DQ is great, best thing to happen to league (possibly) ever. The real issue is the reduction on time to reach lv30, flooding ranked and draft with screaming noob-children. This is actually not related to DQ at all. Just about everything related to trolling, feeders, imbalanced matchups and increasing toxicity is due to this.
